edu.ucla.sspace.index

Class RandomOrthogonalVectorGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucla.sspace.index.RandomOrthogonalVectorGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DoubleVectorGenerator<DoubleVector>, Generator<DoubleVector>, Serializable

    public class RandomOrthogonalVectorGenerator
extends Object
implements DoubleVectorGenerator<DoubleVector>, Serializable
    An class that generates DoubleVectors that are orthogonal to each other based on configurable properties using the Gram-Schmidt orthogonalization process. This class supports three properties:
    Property: "edu.ucla.sspace.index.RandomOrthogonalVectorGenerator.mean"
    Default: 0
    This variable sets the gaussian mean for generating values in random vectors.

    Property: "edu.ucla.sspace.index.RandomOrthogonalVectorGenerator.std"
    Default: 1
    This variable sets the std when generating gaussian values for random vectors.

    Property: "edu.ucla.sspace.index.RandomOrthogonalVectorGenerator.length"
    Default: 1000
    This variable sets the length of vectors to create. Note that vector lengths passed to generateRandomVector is ignored.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      static int DEFAULT_VECTOR_LENGTH
      The default number of dimensions to create in each TernaryVector.

      The default number of values to set in an TernaryVector.
      static int DEFAULT_VECTOR_STANDARD_DEVIATION
      The default random std in the number of values that are set in an TernaryVector.
      static Random RANDOM
      A random number generator that can be accessed to other classes which will rely on the same source of random values.
      static String VECTOR_LENGTH_PROPERTY 
      static String VECTOR_MEAN_PROPERTY
      The property to specify the number of values to set in an TernaryVector.
      static String VECTOR_STANDARD_DEVIATION_PROPERTY
      The property to specify the std in the number of values to set in an TernaryVector.
